PerfectNetExp.abs: 无,无字... ... [don't] 不要,不用 [unsavoriness;tasteless;unpalatable] 没有味道 [dull;uninteresting;insipid] 毫无趣味,枯燥.

list.abs: part of Eleanor's objection to James working for his father was that she wanted to spare him too much knowledge of the unsavory side of the family life .埃莉诺之所以反对詹姆斯为父亲工作，其中的一个原因是她不想让他过多地知道家庭生活中不大光彩的一面。
an unsavory reputation ; an unsavory scandal., 败坏的名声 ; 令人憎恶的丑闻.
like Garment , he saw in Watergate a means to purify the Administration by getting rid of unsavory elements .他同加门特一样，认为可以从水门事件下手，清除不良分子，纯洁政府。
an unsavory reputation ; an unsavory scandal., 败坏的名声 ; 令人憎恶的丑闻.
